mapper.select: select interviewer.room from interviewer, student_info where interviewer.user_name = student_info.first_try and student_info.id = #{id}
select interviewer.room from interviewer, student_info where interviewer.user_name = student_info.second_try and student_info.id = #{id}

select * from (interviewer inner join phase_interviewer on interviewer.user_name=phase_interviewer.intervier_name and phase_interviewer.year=#{year} and phase_interviewer.phase=#{phase} and phase_interviewer.city=#{city}) left join (select first_try,count(*) from student_info where (state = #{state} or state = '已发Offer' or state = '待定Offer' or state = '不发Offer') and is_deleted != 1 group by first_try) as tmp on phase_interviewer.intervier_name=tmp.first_try order by interviewer.user_name

select * from interviewer, phase_interviewer, (select job, first_try,count(*) from student_info where (state = #{state} or state = '面试结束') and is_deleted != 1 group by first_try,job) as tmp where interviewer.user_name=phase_interviewer.intervier_name and phase_interviewer.intervier_name=tmp.first_try and phase_interviewer.year=#{year} and phase_interviewer.phase=#{phase} and phase_interviewer.city=#{city} and interviewer.id = #{interid}
